if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE STREQUAL "Debug")
    SET (BUILD_TYPE_SUBDIR Debug)
else ()
    SET (BUILD_TYPE_SUBDIR Release)
endif ()

if (WIN32)
    FILE (COPY bin/${BUILD_TYPE_SUBDIR}/ DESTINATION "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin")
    FILE (COPY archive/${BUILD_TYPE_SUBDIR}/ DESTINATION "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib")
else ()
    FILE (COPY lib/${BUILD_TYPE_SUBDIR}/ DESTINATION "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib")
endif ()
